A

addCreature(Creature) - Method in class Inventory

Area - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents the area with specified width and height.
Area(int, int) - Constructor for class Area
Creates a new area with the given width and height.
Area1 - Class in Unnamed Package
The Area1 class represents a specific area, extending from a base Area class.
Area1() - Constructor for class Area1
Constructs an Area1 object with predefined dimensions and creature capacity.
Area1Panel - Class in Unnamed Package
the Area1Panel class is a graphical user interface component that represents a specific area in a game, with functionalities to move a creature within the area, encounter creatures, and switch to the battle phase.
Area1Panel(JPanel) - Constructor for class Area1Panel
Constructs an Area1Panelwith a reference to another panel that manages different views or stages.
